Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Authorizes Suffolk regional off-track betting corporations to host video lottery gaming devices
Summary: Authorizes Suffolk regional off-track betting corporations to host video lottery gaming devices.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Amd §503, RWB L; amd §§1612 & 1617-a, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law and the tax law, in relation to allowing Suffolk off-track betting corporations to host video lottery gaming devices
